The 8 Best Reusable Straws of 2023 for Every Type of Drink

By Cai Cramer  Updated on February 13, 2023 04:01PM EST

---

- There’s a new accessory on the lips of all our editors — and no, we don’t mean another plumping lipgloss. We’re talking about the eco-friendly, oh-so-trendy reusable straw.

Reusable straws have become more than just an earth-conscious alternative to disposable plastic beverage sippers. They are now a cute accessory to express your personal style. From colorful glass stirrers to earthy bamboo straws perfect for your mid-afternoon iced Diet Coke, the right reusable straw for you is out there.

We set out on a mission to find the best reusable straws so that you don’t have to. Read on to find the best reusable straws in a variety of materials and prices.

---

- BEST OVERALL:
United by Blue The Straw Kit

Who It’s Good For:
These stainless steel straws are great for anyone looking for convenient reusable straws with an included carrying case

Who It’s Not Good For:
We can’t think of anyone who wouldn’t like these straws!

---

- Best Glass:
Kikkerland Reusable Glass Straws

Who It’s Good For:
Someone who wants a beautiful, colorful straw set that’s dishwasher safe

Who It’s Not Good For:
Those who prefer a softer straw tip

---

- Best for On-the-Go:
Kynup 4Packs Reusable Straws

Who It’s Good For:
Anyone looking for a convenient, portable 4-pack of extendable straws with carrying cases

Who It’s Not Good For:
Those who prefer a softer mouth feel from a straw — these are metal

---

- Best for Travel:
Anpro Portable Stainless Steel Collapsible Straws

Who It’s Good For:
Anyone who wants a super compact, portable straw that you can always keep on you

Who It’s Not Good For:
Those wanting more than three straws in a set

---

- Best Bamboo:
Bambaw Reusable Bamboo Drinking Straws

Who It’s Good For:
Those in search of a reusable bamboo straw, as these ones can handle both hot and cold beverages

Who It’s Not Good For:
Some shoppers note that these straws start to degrade after three months of heavy use, good to keep in mind if you’d prefer a life-long straw

---

- Best Metal:
OXO Good Grips 5-Piece Set Reusable Straws

Who It’s Good For:
Anyone looking for the durability of a metal straw with the comfortable mouth-feel of a silicone one

Who It’s Not Good For:
Some shoppers note that the silicone tips wear away over time
